com.nickeson

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nickeson.Person
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public class Person
extends java.lang.Object
    Title: Person.java

    Project: Base Library

    Description: A class to model a Person

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company: Silicon Mountain Technologies

    Since:
    May 17, 2016

    updates:

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    nickeson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Person()
      default no-arg constructor warns against creating a null Person
      Person(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName)
      minimal constructor requires first & last name
      Person(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String dob)
      convenience constructor allows first and last name & dob fields to be set upon instantiation
      Person(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String dob, java.lang.String genderIdentity)
      convenience constructor allows first & last names, dob and genderIdentity fields to be set upon instantiation
      Person(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String dob, java.lang.String genderIdentity, java.util.List<java.lang.String> nickNames)
      convenience constructor allows all Person fields to be set upon instantiation

    • Constructor Detail

      • Person

        public Person()
        default no-arg constructor warns against creating a null Person

      • Person

        public Person(java.lang.String firstName,
              java.lang.String lastName)
        minimal constructor requires first & last name

      • Person

        public Person(java.lang.String firstName,
              java.lang.String lastName,
              java.lang.String dob)
        convenience constructor allows first and last name & dob fields to be set upon instantiation
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name to set
        lastName - the last name to set
        dob - the DateOfBirth to set (2016-12-03 is proper format)

      • Person

        public Person(java.lang.String firstName,
              java.lang.String lastName,
              java.lang.String dob,
              java.lang.String genderIdentity)
        convenience constructor allows first & last names, dob and genderIdentity fields to be set upon instantiation
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name to set
        lastName - the last name to set
        dob - the DateOfBirth to set (2016-12-03 is proper format)
        genderIdentity - the gender identity to set

      • Person

        public Person(java.lang.String firstName,
              java.lang.String lastName,
              java.lang.String dob,
              java.lang.String genderIdentity,
              java.util.List<java.lang.String> nickNames)
        convenience constructor allows all Person fields to be set upon instantiation
        Parameters:
        firstName - the first name to set
        lastName - the last name to set
        dob - the DateOfBirth to set (2016-12-03 is proper format)
        genderIdentity - the gender identity to set
        nickNames - a List of the nick name(s) to set
